interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Hand Crafted Ceramic Aromatherapy Essential Oil Diffuser,100ml Fragrant Room Sprays Ultrasonic Aroma Mist Atomizer BPA-Free, Waterless Auto Shut-Off and 7 Color Night Lights for Office Home Study Yoga Review Date: 2019/07/16 Store: BRNBW Average Rating: 4.0 Product Details: {'Brand': 'BRNBW', 'Material': 'Ceramic', 'Special Feature': 'Multiple Light Setting, Automatic Shut Off', 'Power Source': 'Corded Electric', 'Capacity': '100 Milliliters', 'Product Dimensions': '3.6 x 3.6 x 6.3 inches; 1.12 Pounds', 'UPC': '665059186312'} Review Text: I have a similar diffuser but the cover is plastic, this one is ceramic and it feels and looks so much nicer!
I have another diffuser in bed room and love it so much, wanted to get another one for kitchen.

Ultrasonic aroma diffuser is so much better than candle and room spray in my opinion.
I don't like candle makes fuse and burning smell afterward.
Room spray is overpowering smell at first and doesn't last too long.
On the other hand, diffuser doesn't make fuse,burning smell and smells evenly from begging to end.
This is 100ml size and you think it's small and for only bed room but we live in 2600+ sqft , oepn floor house and when I use this in kitchen, I can still smell in my living room! (I think our ceiling fan help as well.)
This is really great addition for bedroom, living room or entryway!
Lighting is therapeutic at night too!
Totally recommend!! Review Title: Love it Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:

profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Preference:** The user shows a strong preference for ceramic materials over plastic, indicating a preference for aesthetics and quality in home decor items.
- **Aromatherapy Enthusiast:** They favor ultrasonic aroma diffusers, highlighting a dislike for traditional candles and room sprays due to their overpowering scents and residue.
- **Functional Design:** Emphasizes the importance of features such as automatic shut-off, multiple light settings, and overall versatility in product use across different spaces in the home.
- **Space Utilization:** Enjoys using diffusers in various rooms, indicating a tendency to create a pleasant ambiance throughout their large living area (over 2600 sqft).
- **Therapeutic Elements:** Appreciates the therapeutic aspects of aromatherapy and lighting, suggesting a focus on wellness and relaxation in their home environment.
- **Positive Engagement:** Engaged positively with products that enhance both functionality and aesthetic appeal, valuing recommendations based on performance in different settings.

This profile reflects a user oriented towards creating a comfortable, aromatic, and visually pleasing home atmosphere through thoughtfully selected decor items.
